maml:description.maml:para: Create a new deployment. Note that there shouldn't be a deployment of the same name or in the same slot when executing this command.
Package location. This parameter should have the path or URI to a .cspkg in blob storage whose storage account is part of the same subscription/project.
Configuration file path. This parameter should specifiy a .cscfg file on disk.
Label name for the new deployment.

Storage service name. You can use this parameter when the package location is a path from file system. If you doesn’t specify this parameter the cmdlet uses the service name parameter as storage service name.
